item.description:
The Spiritually-Evolved Man and Woman with Mother Clare Watts

Saturday, Aug 28 • 10 a.m. ~ 2:00 p.m. • Suggested Donation $35, Bring a Friend for Free!

(Light Lunch Included)

The respected What Is Enlightenment? magazine in its August 2008 issue invited Mother Clare to envision the future of men. Now she expands this discussion for both men and women to teach us about 'The Spiritually Evolved Man and Woman.' How are spiritual men and women the same and how are they different? What does this bright future look like and how can we begin to embody it now? Come meet Mother Clare Watts, Priest, author, and national speaker as she brings the process of spiritual evolution down to earth and into the realm of possibility for anyone who wants it, male or female. View Mother Clare's videos on YouTube at: http://www.youtube.co...
item.name: Seminar: The Spiritually-Evolved Man and Woman
